TextView.android:text:
NFC - This app uses NFC tags to help you manage your personal belongings. NFC is the same technology used in Apple Pay and wireless car keys. Tap the tag against the back of your phone when directed.

Groups - Use these as groups/lists of items to track, e.g. 'Backpack supplies' or 'Safari trip'.

Items - These are important things you want to track, e.g. 'External hard drive' or 'Camera lens'.
